attributes.action:
Prime Mininster May to resign for 
failing to be upfront with Donald Trump!
attributes.background: Theresa May told Andrew Marr she would "not be afraid" to tell Donald Trump when things where unacceptable. She went to the US and did the complete opposite- telling Mr Trump he did well to become President and then failed to condemn President Trumps comments on torture or the ban on immigrants.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
